import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import avatar from "./../images/default-user.png"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export const UserForm = () => { const params = useParams(); const [roles, setRoles] = useState([]); if (params.id) { fetch("http://localhost:8082/ShoppingCartAdmin/role/getAll") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((result) => { setRoles(result); }); } console.log(roles); return ( <>
